nodes.text: The Package is a mini-adventure included in the West End Games publication Twin Stars of Kira. It was written by Dave Marron. It was illustrated by John Paul Lona.

A group of adventurers are contacted in a cantina on Roldalna by the Buzchub Und'l. He hires them to move spice from Nigel VI to Lohopa II. However, when the adventurers get to Nigel VI, they discover the cargo is actually the poison lexonite. They must then decide what to do: turn it over to the authorities on Nigel VI, alert the New Republic, or try and double-cross the receivers on the other end.
